story.book

Class StoryFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • story.book.StoryModel<StoryView>
      • story.book.StoryFragment

  • public class StoryFragment
extends StoryModel<StoryView>
    Model class for representing fragments of a story which extends the abstract class StoryModel. A StoryFragment contains a collection of Illustration objects and DecisionBranch objects.
    Author:
    Alexander Cheung
    See Also:
    Story, Illustration, TextIllustration, DecisionBranch

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StoryFragment(java.lang.String fragmentTitle)
      Returns a StoryFragment initialized with the specified title.
